actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide for the funding and administration of a Veterans Mission for Youth Initiative within the Troops-to-Teachers Program.

summary.text: Veterans Mission for Youth Act - Amends the Troops-to-Teachers Program Act (title XVII of the National Defense Authorization Act of Fiscal Year 2000) to direct the Secretary of Defense, through the Defense Activity for Non-Traditional Education Support Division of the Department of Defense, to establish a Veterans Mission for Youth Initiative to award grants to eligible organizations to carry out programs through which veterans provide mentoring, tutoring, after-school, and other services for youth.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the funding and administration of a Veterans Mission for Youth Initiative within the Troops-to-Teachers Program.
